mapper.select: SELECT max(battings.inning) FROM battings INNER JOIN batters ON battings.batter_id = batters.id WHERE batters.event_id = #{eventId}

SELECT batters.id AS batter_id, batters.event_id AS batter_event_id, batters.member_id AS batter_member_id, batters.bOrder AS batter_order, members.id AS member_id, members.nick_name AS member_nickname FROM batters INNER JOIN members ON batters.member_id = members.id WHERE batters.event_id = #{eventId} ORDER BY batters.bOrder

SELECT members.id AS memberId, count(battings.id) AS daseki, count(DISTINCT events.id) AS game, sum(battings.dasu) AS dasu, sum(battings.steal) AS steal, sum(battings.hit1 + battings.hit2 + battings.hit3 + battings.homerun) AS hit, sum(battings.hit1) AS hit1, sum(battings.hit2) AS hit2, sum(battings.hit3) AS hit3, sum(battings.homerun) AS homerun, sum(battings.rbi) AS rbi, sum(battings.sout) AS sout, sum(battings.fball) AS fball, sum(battings.dball) AS dball, sum(battings.hit1 + battings.hit2 * 2 + battings.hit3 * 3 + battings.homerun * 4) AS ruida FROM events RIGHT OUTER JOIN batters ON batters.event_id = events.id RIGHT OUTER JOIN battings ON battings.batter_id = batters.id LEFT OUTER JOIN members ON batters.member_id = members.id WHERE events.date >= #{begin} AND events.date <= #{end} GROUP BY members.id
